head.title: Proginet Raises Sales But Has Loss in Quarter

hedline.hl1: Proginet Raises Sales But Has Loss in Quarter

abstract.p: Proginet Corp reports third-quartr loss of $115,612 on sales of $1.16 million and 11 percent rise in revenue; reports decline in revenue to $3.14 million in three quarters to April 30 (S)

block.p: The Proginet Corporation of Garden City (VSE: PRFu.v) reported a third-quarter loss of $115,612 on sales of $1.16 million, which the company attributed to a slowdown in purchases by owners of mainframe computers worried about Y2K computer problems. Proginet develops software applications that integrate computing environments.

The Proginet Corporation of Garden City (VSE: PRFu.v) reported a third-quarter loss of $115,612 on sales of $1.16 million, which the company attributed to a slowdown in purchases by owners of mainframe computers worried about Y2K computer problems. Proginet develops software applications that integrate computing environments.

Revenues rose 11 percent from the similar 1999 quarter. The loss compared to a profit of $58,307 a year earlier. For the three quarters to April 30, revenues fell to $3.14 million, from $3.42 million.
